translation:
I have been passing without major news, despite great headaches yesterday and today.

Tomorrow I suppose our electoral work will end, and if possible I intend to return Thursday or Friday. A hug to our Mingote and Bernardino, whom I have missed very much and I wish to already embrace my Mingote.

Greetings to the godmother, godfathers, and everyone in general.

Your old one at heart Almeida. Rio Grande, October 21, 1828.

Mrs. Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida. Pelotas.
